name: Flying Robot Simulator 3D
description:
Fight for earth! War machines of a cyborg race tear the city. A robot hero in iron armor must rise. Defend the Earth, fight the cyborg war machines... or wreck the city! Robot action games are rewired in Flying Robot Simulator. City sandbox for iron robot!  

Flying Robot Simulator features:  

- Iron cyborg hordes
- Action nonstop
- Flying over the roofs
 - Quests or freeplay
 - Cool 3D graphics and sound 
- City torn by war machines
 
Flying Robot Simulator offers smooth controls, fight against cyborg war machines will flow through the city. Become the city’s iron armor, fight for Earth. Or have fun - action games offer unstopability. Earth and city are in your iron hands. Take sides in Flying Robot Simulator - cyborg race, city dwellers or your own!

  The city has a lot to do in Flying Robot Simulator. Many city quests will keep you busy. Earth needs a hero in armor, city needs help, cyborg needs iron punch. Cyborg invasion is sheer fun in action games! Fight your fight in our iron packed simulator. City is a sandbox!
 
Earth seems unworthy? Break the city with iron hands! A battle robot is unstoppable. Use things around the city as targets or projectiles. Fight hard, so none can fight you and your armor - neither war machines, nor Earth forces. Robot might and iron armor are yours to play with in the city of Flying Robot Simulator, an action games paragon.

  The fight is on! Cyborg invasion on Earth is a chance to unleash your iron might! Join adventures of iron hero with Flying Robot Simulator!
